TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebProcessStatistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 为评估运行进程的状况提供信息。

span.span: Provides information for assessing the health of a running process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 实例类包含使用获取的信息类型。Instances of the class contain information that is obtained using the type. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义事件类的示例，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of creating a custom event class, see the example provided in this topic. 下面是可用于包含进程统计信息的日志检测信号事件启用 ASP.NET 配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of a configuration file you could use to enable ASP.NET to log heartbeat events that contain process statistics. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含两个部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一个是使 ASP.NET 能够使用自定义事件使用的配置文件的摘录类型。The first is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event that uses the type. 第二个演示如何实现此自定义事件...The second shows how to implement this custom event.. 请确保，自定义事件引发在适当的时候，即，将引发它取代了等效的系统运行状况事件时。Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics/CS/webprocessstatisticsevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebProcessStatistics/VB/webprocessstatisticsevent.vb#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

span.span: ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview

public: property int AppDomainCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取进程中的应用程序域数。

span.span: Gets the number of application domains in the process.
The number of application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常是指在过程中，包括默认域的 ASP.NET 应用程序数。This property usually refers to the number of ASP.NET applications in the process, including the default domain. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取值。The following code example shows how to get the value. summary.span: 设置进程统计信息的格式。

span.span: Formats the process statistics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为事件的信息，这很有用，如果必须记录事件数据，并将其更高版本提供给用户提供统一的格式。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 当提供程序调用了一个在内部调用方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置自定义信息的格式。The following code example shows how to format custom information.
